title: Best OnePlus Nord N30 screen protectors
description: Keep your OnePlus Nord N30 display safe with these best screen protectors. The post Best OnePlus Nord N30 screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your OnePlus Nord N30 display safe with these best screen protectors.
text: The OnePlus Nord N30 has a display good enough for everyday usage including media consumption. It has a 6.72-inch IPS LCD panel with Full HD+ (1080 x 2400 pixels) resolution. The display supports 120Hz refresh rate and Always On Display functionality. The only thing to remember is you have to be extra careful when it comes to the phone’s display. This is because a display is a lot more vulnerable to getting damaged than other body parts of your phone. It is the reason we suggest you get a durable screen protector. These are the best OnePlus Nord N30 screen protectors you can buy. Best OnePlus Nord N30 cases MAYtobe Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a budget screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It claims to maintain touch response and transparency. It has anti-stain and anti-fingerprint properties. There are two screen protectors, tempered film cleaning kits, and dust removal stickers in the package. Kwmobile Screen Protector It is another budget screen protector option. It offers easy installation that prevents air bubbles. It is scratch-resistant and has an oleophobic coating to keep smudges away. Sale Orzero Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a screen protector with 9H rated hardness and made with glass thin material. It delivers display clarity with high response and a 2.5D round edge. You get dust remover, screen wipe and lint-free dry cloth with the screen protector for an easy installation. Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack) This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package. Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack) This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat. Sale Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack) This screen protector is also 9H rated and is rainbow-effect proof. It has 2.5D rounded edge glass and it maintains the original touch experience. You get two screen protectors with the package. html:
The OnePlus Nord N30 has a display good enough for everyday usage including media consumption. It has a 6.72-inch IPS LCD panel with Full HD+ (1080 x 2400 pixels) resolution. The display supports 120Hz refresh rate and Always On Display functionality.

The only thing to remember is you have to be extra careful when it comes to the phone’s display. This is because a display is a lot more vulnerable to getting damaged than other body parts of your phone. It is the reason we suggest you get a durable screen protector. These are the best OnePlus Nord N30 screen protectors you can buy.

  • Best OnePlus Nord N30 cases

MAYtobe Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a budget screen protector with 9H rated hardness. It claims to maintain touch response and transparency. It has anti-stain and anti-fingerprint properties. There are two screen protectors, tempered film cleaning kits, and dust removal stickers in the package.

Kwmobile Screen Protector

It is another budget screen protector option. It offers easy installation that prevents air bubbles. It is scratch-resistant and has an oleophobic coating to keep smudges away.

Sale

Orzero Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a screen protector with 9H rated hardness and made with glass thin material. It delivers display clarity with high response and a 2.5D round edge. You get dust remover, screen wipe and lint-free dry cloth with the screen protector for an easy installation.

Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack)

This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package.

Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack)

This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat.

Sale

Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack)

This screen protector is also 9H rated and is rainbow-effect proof. It has 2.5D rounded edge glass and it maintains the original touch experience. You get two screen protectors with the package.
